title: DevSecOps as a first-class capability
summary: Bake security, compliance, and quality controls into delivery paths so modernization can move fast safely.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Security and compliance gates become blockers if they are not designed into the platform from the start.
whenNotToUse: A short-lived spike with no intent to productionize

thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Automate the basics (scans, policies) and focus humans on true risk decisions.

complexity.rationale: Tooling exists; alignment and enforcement are hard.
complexity.toolingDemand: CI/CD checks, policy tooling, secret management.

realWorldExample.approach: Integrated security scans and environment approvals into standard pipelines.
